name: Never Enough (FNaF Fangame)
description:
The evil game development conglomerate TILDED~GAMES has constructed an underground factory to mass-produce poor MS Paint ripoffs of the FNaF series. You the player, working with a team of several others, plan to infiltrate the facility to gather intel and find a way to permanently destroy the source of all of their games. Yet you haven't realized that you yourself are currently inside of a bad MS Paint fangame. Unaware of what dangers await you and what great sacrifice you must make if you want to destroy these atrocious fangames, you descend into the darkness.

It's a Clickteam Fusion FNaF fan game! If you are unable to run this game properly on your device, you should seriously consider upgrading your computer.

ALSO VERY IMPORTANT: you need to install the fonts that come with the game. If you don't, then the text will not render correctly.

Five Nights at Freddy's belongs to Scott Cawthon. This is merely a fangame using characters and locations from the FNaF series (SL and FFPS in particular) and is not associated with the story of the original games.
